#!/bin/bash
# Java 17 Migration Verification Script

echo "=========================================="
echo "Java 17 Migration Verification"
echo "=========================================="
echo ""

echo "1. Checking Java version..."
java -version 2>&1 | head -3
echo ""

echo "2. Building project..."
mvn clean verify -q
BUILD_STATUS=$?
echo ""

if [ $BUILD_STATUS -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "✅ Build: SUCCESS"
else
    echo "❌ Build: FAILED"
    exit 1
fi
echo ""

echo "3. Checking compiled bytecode version..."
MAJOR_VERSION=$(javap -v target/classes/mesosphere/marathon/client/Marathon.class 2>/dev/null | grep "major version" | awk '{print $3}')
if [ "$MAJOR_VERSION" = "61" ]; then
    echo "✅ Bytecode major version: $MAJOR_VERSION (Java 17)"
else
    echo "❌ Bytecode major version: $MAJOR_VERSION (Expected: 61)"
    exit 1
fi
echo ""

echo "4. Checking JAR manifest..."
JAR_JDK_SPEC=$(unzip -q -c target/marathon-client-0.6.3.jar META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | grep "Build-Jdk-Spec:" | awk '{print $2}')
if [ "$JAR_JDK_SPEC" = "17" ]; then
    echo "✅ JAR Build-Jdk-Spec: $JAR_JDK_SPEC"
else
    echo "❌ JAR Build-Jdk-Spec: $JAR_JDK_SPEC (Expected: 17)"
    exit 1
fi
echo ""

echo "5. Checking test results..."
TEST_SUMMARY=$(mvn test -q 2>&1 | grep "Tests run:")
echo "$TEST_SUMMARY"
FAILURES=$(echo "$TEST_SUMMARY" | grep -o "Failures: [0-9]*" | awk '{print $2}')
ERRORS=$(echo "$TEST_SUMMARY" | grep -o "Errors: [0-9]*" | awk '{print $2}')

if [ "$FAILURES" = "0" ] && [ "$ERRORS" = "0" ]; then
    echo "✅ All tests passed"
else
    echo "❌ Some tests failed"
    exit 1
fi
echo ""

echo "=========================================="
echo "✅ Java 17 Migration Successful!"
echo "=========================================="

# Marathon Client - Java 17 Migration Complete

## Summary
The marathon-client project has been successfully migrated from **Java 8 to Java 17**. All tests pass and the build completes successfully with `mvn clean verify`.

## Migration Details

### 1. POM.xml Configuration Changes

#### Java Version Properties
```xml
<properties>
    <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
    <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
    ...
</properties>
```

#### Dependency Version Updates

| Dependency | Old Version | New Version | Source |
|------------|-------------|-------------|---------|
| gson | 2.5 | 2.11.0 | Recommended |
| guava | 20.0 | 23.0 | Recommended |
| slf4j-api | 1.7.13 | 2.0.16 | Recommended |
| commons-io | 2.4 | 2.17.0 | Recommended |
| nimbus-jose-jwt | 7.9 | 9.37.3 | Manual |
| junit | 4.11 | 4.13.2 | Recommended |
| mockwebserver | 3.5.0 | 4.12.0 | Manual |
| groovy-all | 2.4.10 | 3.0.22 | Manual |
| spock-core | 1.1-groovy-2.4-rc-4 | 2.3-groovy-3.0 | Manual |
| cglib-nodep | 3.2.5 | 3.3.0 | Manual |
| objenesis | 2.5.1 | 3.3 | Manual |

#### Maven Plugin Updates

| Plugin | Old Version | New Version | Reason |
|--------|-------------|-------------|---------|
| maven-compiler-plugin | 3.3 | 3.13.0 | Java 17 support |
| gmavenplus-plugin | 1.5 | 3.0.2 | Groovy 3.0 support |
| maven-bundle-plugin | 3.2.0 | 5.1.9 | Java 17 compatibility |
| maven-surefire-plugin | 2.19.1 | 3.2.5 | Better test support |
| maven-javadoc-plugin | 2.10.4 | 3.6.3 | Java 17 support |

### 2. Build Configuration Updates

#### Maven Compiler Plugin
```xml
<plugin>
    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>3.13.0</version>
    <configuration>
        <source>17</source>
        <target>17</target>
        <release>17</release>  <!-- Added for Java 17 -->
        <encoding>UTF-8</encoding>
    </configuration>
</plugin>
```

#### Gmavenplus Plugin (Groovy Test Support)
```xml
<plugin>
    <groupId>org.codehaus.gmavenplus</groupId>
    <artifactId>gmavenplus-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>3.0.2</version>
    <executions>
        <execution>
            <goals>
                <goal>addTestSources</goal>
                <goal>compileTests</goal>  <!-- Changed from testCompile -->
            </goals>
        </execution>
    </executions>
</plugin>
```

#### Javadoc Plugin (Release Profile)
```xml
<plugin>
    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
    <version>3.6.3</version>
    <executions>...</executions>
    <configuration>
        <doclint>none</doclint>  <!-- Added to handle Java 17 strict validation -->
    </configuration>
</plugin>
```

### 3. Special Considerations

#### Groovy-All Dependency
Added `<type>pom</type>` to groovy-all dependency as the artifact type changed in Groovy 3.0:
```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.codehaus.groovy</groupId>
    <artifactId>groovy-all</artifactId>
    <version>3.0.22</version>
    <type>pom</type>  <!-- Required for Groovy 3.0 -->
    <scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
```

- Clean verify time: ~6 seconds
